sentences.sContent: Border skirmishes between India and Pakistan were common.
sentences.sCn: 印巴边境的小冲突曾经是常有的事。

sentences.sContent: They were skirmishing close to the minefield now.
sentences.sCn: 他们当时正在雷区附近小规模交火。

trans.tranCn: 小冲突，小规模战斗；小争论
trans.tranOther: a fight between small groups of soldiers, ships etc, especially one that happens away from the main part of a battle – used in news reports

trans.tranCn: 进行小规模战斗；发生小争论
